text: My wife pays this bill, and I've had log in difficulties. I got a page that only displayed pay or not pay options, not log in. Getting to the "settings " page is awkward. It feels like they were too cheap to really test it out. I ended up hitting a button that had me buy another subscription. I called customer service and was told the new subscription might take 24-48 hours to post. I've invested an hour plus fiddling with . I hate the app, love the magazine.
